content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":170421,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そして、その後の様子は分からない、と」","translatedEnglishLine":"'And after that, we don't know what happened,'"},{"lineNumber":170422,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うう……心配ですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"'U-uh... it's worrying...'"},{"lineNumber":170423,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハハハハ、あの男の心配なんて、","translatedEnglishLine":"'Hahaha, worrying about that man is...'"},{"lineNumber":170424,"originalJapaneseLine":"　するだけ無駄だろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"...just useless.'"},{"lineNumber":170425,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのとき、たまたま同じ部屋にいた","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, Saarnakia, who happened to be in the same room,"},{"lineNumber":170426,"originalJapaneseLine":"サーナキアが笑い飛ばした。","translatedEnglishLine":"laughed it off."},{"lineNumber":170427,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……え、えと」","translatedEnglishLine":"'...Uh, well...'"},{"lineNumber":170428,"originalJapaneseLine":"呑気な発言に、皆が返答に窮する。","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone was at a loss for how to respond to the carefree remark."},{"lineNumber":170429,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、なんかすみません、うちの団長が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Ah, I'm sorry, it's our leader...'"},{"lineNumber":170430,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんかすみません、とはなんだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"'What's with the 'I'm sorry'!'"},{"lineNumber":170431,"originalJapaneseLine":"「みんな、閣下が心配なんですよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"'Everyone is worried about Your Excellency."},{"lineNumber":170432,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なのに呑気なこと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"And yet you're so nonchalant...'"},{"lineNumber":170433,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの男の心配をしても無駄なのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"'The reason worrying about that man is useless,"},{"lineNumber":170434,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ボクの経験則に基づくものだぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"is based on my own experience.'"},

{"lineNumber":170435,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リーダーはあのランスだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"'The leader is that Rance."},{"lineNumber":170436,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しぶとさと悪運の強さにかけてはピカ一な男だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"When it comes to persistence and bad luck, he's unmatched.'"},{"lineNumber":170437,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なぁに、すぐにひょっこり帰ってくるさ」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Well, he'll pop back sooner or later.'"},{"lineNumber":170438,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"'............'"},{"lineNumber":170439,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"'............'"},{"lineNumber":170440,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む……そんなに変なことを","translatedEnglishLine":"'Hmm... did I say something that strange...'"},{"lineNumber":170441,"originalJapaneseLine":"　言ってしまっただろうか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Did I say something strange...?'"},{"lineNumber":170442,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ……","translatedEnglishLine":"'No...'"},{"lineNumber":170443,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サーナキアさんの言う通りだと思います」","translatedEnglishLine":"'I think Saarnakia-san is right.'"},

{"lineNumber":170444,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私達が心配していても","translatedEnglishLine":"'Even if we worry,"},{"lineNumber":170445,"originalJapaneseLine":"　出来ることなんてありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"there's nothing we can do."},{"lineNumber":170446,"originalJapaneseLine":"「出来るのは……信じることだけ」","translatedEnglishLine":"'All we can do... is believe.'"},{"lineNumber":170447,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、サーナキアさんが","translatedEnglishLine":"'Hehe, Saarnakia-san seems to understand best.'"},

{"lineNumber":170448,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一番分かっていたようですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"'She seems to understand more than anyone else.'"},

{"lineNumber":170449,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、私も……信じます」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Yes, I also... believe.'"},

{"lineNumber":170450,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、そうですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Hehe, yes indeed.'"},{"lineNumber":170451,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ん？","translatedEnglishLine":"'...Hmm?'"},{"lineNumber":170452,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんだ、クルーチェ、ジッと見て」","translatedEnglishLine":"'What's wrong, Cruce? You're staring intently.'"},

{"lineNumber":170453,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ウチ、案外団長のそゆとこ好きっすよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"'I actually kinda like that about the leader.'"},

{"lineNumber":170454,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Huh?'"},

{"lineNumber":170455,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達がベズドグ山に到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others arrived at Mount Bezdog."},

{"lineNumber":170456,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここが、ベズドグ山か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"'So this is Mount Bezdog...'"},

{"lineNumber":170457,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達の眼前に広がるのは、天然の要塞。","translatedEnglishLine":"In front of Rance and the others spread a natural fortress."},

{"lineNumber":170458,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただその場に立っているだけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Just standing there,"},

{"lineNumber":170459,"originalJapaneseLine":"熱波が吹き荒れ、ランス達の肌を撫でていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"a heatwave blew fiercely, brushing against their skin."},

{"lineNumber":170460,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっつ……","translatedEnglishLine":"'So hot...'"},

{"lineNumber":170461,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あいつ、こんな火山に暮らしてるのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"'That guy lives in a volcano like this?'"},

{"lineNumber":170462,"originalJapaneseLine":"「太古から存在している山でな、","translatedEnglishLine":"'It's a mountain that's been here since ancient times,"},

{"lineNumber":170463,"originalJapaneseLine":"　正確には活火山ではない」","translatedEnglishLine":"but technically, it's not an active volcano.'"},{"lineNumber":170464,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　どう見ても火ィ噴いてるぞ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"'? It looks like it's spewing fire though?'"},{"lineNumber":170465,"originalJapaneseLine":"「火、だけではない、と言った方がいいか」","translatedEnglishLine":"'It's better to say it's not just fire.'"},

{"lineNumber":170466,"originalJapaneseLine":"「炎、氷、雷、光、闇、","translatedEnglishLine":"'Flames, ice, lightning, light, darkness,"},

{"lineNumber":170467,"originalJapaneseLine":"　数十年周期でその内のどれかが噴き出し、","translatedEnglishLine":"one of these erupts every several decades,"},

{"lineNumber":170468,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それに覆われる山だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"covering the mountain.'"},

{"lineNumber":170469,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人間界に比べて魔物界は危険な場所が多いが、","translatedEnglishLine":"'Compared to the human world, the monster world has many dangerous places,"},

{"lineNumber":170470,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その中でも指折り。","translatedEnglishLine":"and this is one of the most dangerous among them."},

{"lineNumber":170471,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物と言えどもおいそれとは近づかない」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even monsters don't approach it easily.'"},

{"lineNumber":170472,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マグマにでも飲み込まれた日には、","translatedEnglishLine":"'If swallowed by magma,"},

{"lineNumber":170473,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どんな魔物でも簡単に溶けて死ぬからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"any monster would quickly melt and die.'"},{"lineNumber":170474,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Ugh...'"},

{"lineNumber":170475,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのとき、キャロリが頭を押さえた。","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment, Caroly held her head."},

{"lineNumber":170476,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん……熱気にやられたか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Hmm... did the heat get to you?'"},

{"lineNumber":170477,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、これは……","translatedEnglishLine":"'No, this is...'"},

{"lineNumber":170478,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どこか気分が悪くなって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm feeling somewhat unwell...'"},

{"lineNumber":170479,"originalJapaneseLine":"「確かに山全体に不穏な空気が漂っているわ……","translatedEnglishLine":"'Certainly, an uneasy atmosphere drifts over the whole mountain...'"},

{"lineNumber":170480,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんなに暑いのに……","translatedEnglishLine":"'Even though it's this hot...'"}

]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、その後の様子は分からない、と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'And after that, we don't know what happened,'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うう……心配ですね……」
「ハハハハ、あの男の心配なんて、
するだけ無駄だろう」
そのとき、たまたま同じ部屋にいた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, Saarnakia, who happened to be in the same room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サーナキアが笑い飛ばした。
呑気な発言に、皆が返答に窮する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone was at a loss for how to respond to the carefree remark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、なんかすみません、うちの団長が……」
「なんかすみません、とはなんだ！」
「みんな、閣下が心配なんですよ。
なのに呑気なこと……」
「あの男の心配をしても無駄なのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'The reason worrying about that man is useless,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボクの経験則に基づくものだぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is based on my own experience.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーダーはあのランスだ。
しぶとさと悪運の強さにかけてはピカ一な男だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When it comes to persistence and bad luck, he's unmatched.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なぁに、すぐにひょっこり帰ってくるさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Well, he'll pop back sooner or later.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む……そんなに変なことを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Hmm... did I say something that strange...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言ってしまっただろうか……」
「いえ……
サーナキアさんの言う通りだと思います」
「私達が心配していても
出来ることなんてありません」
「出来るのは……信じることだけ」
「ふふ、サーナキアさんが
一番分かっていたようですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'She seems to understand more than anyone else.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、私も……信じます」
「ふふ、そうですね」
なんだ、クルーチェ、ジッと見て」
「ウチ、案外団長のそゆとこ好きっすよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'I actually kinda like that about the leader.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ？」
ランス達がベズドグ山に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others arrived at Mount Bezdog.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここが、ベズドグ山か……」
ランス達の眼前に広がるのは、天然の要塞。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of Rance and the others spread a natural fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただその場に立っているだけで、
熱波が吹き荒れ、ランス達の肌を撫でていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a heatwave blew fiercely, brushing against their skin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっつ……
あいつ、こんな火山に暮らしてるのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'That guy lives in a volcano like this?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「太古から存在している山でな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'It's a mountain that's been here since ancient times,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正確には活火山ではない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but technically, it's not an active volcano.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「？　どう見ても火ィ噴いてるぞ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: '? It looks like it's spewing fire though?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「火、だけではない、と言った方がいいか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'It's better to say it's not just fire.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「炎、氷、雷、光、闇、
数十年周期でその内のどれかが噴き出し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: one of these erupts every several decades,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに覆われる山だ」
「人間界に比べて魔物界は危険な場所が多いが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Compared to the human world, the monster world has many dangerous places,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その中でも指折り。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and this is one of the most dangerous among them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物と言えどもおいそれとは近づかない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even monsters don't approach it easily.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マグマにでも飲み込まれた日には、
どんな魔物でも簡単に溶けて死ぬからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: any monster would quickly melt and die.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのとき、キャロリが頭を押さえた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, Caroly held her head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん……熱気にやられたか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Hmm... did the heat get to you?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、これは……
どこか気分が悪くなって……」
「確かに山全体に不穏な空気が漂っているわ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Certainly, an uneasy atmosphere drifts over the whole mountain...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなに暑いのに……

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'It's better to say it's not just fire.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「炎、氷、雷、光、闇、
数十年周期でその内のどれかが噴き出し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: one of these erupts every several decades,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに覆われる山だ」
「人間界に比べて魔物界は危険な場所が多いが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Compared to the human world, the monster world has many dangerous places,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その中でも指折り。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and this is one of the most dangerous among them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物と言えどもおいそれとは近づかない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even monsters don't approach it easily.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マグマにでも飲み込まれた日には、
どんな魔物でも簡単に溶けて死ぬからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: any monster would quickly melt and die.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのとき、キャロリが頭を押さえた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, Caroly held her head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん……熱気にやられたか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Hmm... did the heat get to you?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、これは……
どこか気分が悪くなって……」
「確かに山全体に不穏な空気が漂っているわ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Certainly, an uneasy atmosphere drifts over the whole mountain...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなに暑いのに……
